q: How do I get started with Defold?
a: Head over to the Learn section of the Defold website. There you will find plenty of tutorials, manuals and examples to get you started.

q: How many games can I submit?
a: As many as you want! But we recommend that you focus on quality over quantity!

q: Is this game jam restricted to Defold developers?
a: Yes, the game has to be created using Defold.

q: How do I integrate the Yandex.Games SDK?
a: A great place to start is to read the Releasing games on Yandex blog post. You can also follow the integration documentation in Yandex.Games SDK for Defold project.
Great! Join us on Discord, post questions on Twitter or send an email with your question to gamejam@defold.se.
